projects.name: Envoy
projects.description: Designed and developed Envoy (a Mac OS-native proprietary asset tracking system) as a replacement for legacy tools to audit and manage 1000+ client computers. Envoy provides regular resource utilization reports; lets users submit support requests; integrates with DeepTech's remote access software; keeps itself up-to-date; and can be remotely reconfigured or uninstalled. Ongoing.

projects.name: Front-end web development
projects.description: Worked with the backend web team to develop a DOM-controlled JavaScript UI library for DeepTech's technician portal, using jQuery extensively along with a small set of jQuery plugins. Ongoing.

projects.name: Hans Haacke: News
projects.description: Built a news extraction engine in Node.js based on [Readability](http://lab.arc90.com/experiments/readability/), powering Hans Haacke's “News” piece. On display as part of [“The Last Newspaper”](http://www.newmuseum.org/exhibitions/428) at the The New Museum.

projects.name: Lasso CalDAV bridge
projects.description: Built a CalDAV bridge for DeepTech's technician scheduling system, replacing an aging calendar solution with one that works across modern mobile devices and software. In progress.

projects.name: Technical service and support
projects.description: Serves on DeepTech's Macintosh and network support team. Handles client questions over the phone, via remote access, and on site. Participates in technology infrastructure design and wiring for clients moving to new spaces.

projects.name: Reverse engineering
projects.description: Reconstructed code based on disassembly of an x86 binary.

projects.name: Forensics
projects.description: Worked with the NYPD to recover data contributing to a criminal investigation.

projects.name: Debugging
projects.description: Reduces and reports bugs in third-party software on a regular basis. Credited for security issues in Mac OS and iOS ([CVE-2010-0537](http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2010-0537), [CVE-2010-1754](http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2010-1754)), credited for other issue in cURL (patched in [7.21.1](http://curl.haxx.se/mail/lib-2010-08/0146.html)).

projects.name: Snap Autocomplete
projects.description: Built a caching JavaScript autocomplete engine for Worcester Polytechnic Institute.

projects.name: FIRST Robotics Team 555, Montclair High School, New Jersey
projects.description: Lead programmer (2005-2007). Built competition robots which won regional championships and earned awards at the regional and international levels, including a regional Innovation in Control award for my programming using machine vision.
